text: Ridgeline International announced a pilot with the Defense Counterintelligence and Security Agency in Arlington, Virginia, on Friday. CEO Karl Jensen said the program will evaluate continuous vetting at scale over 90 days.

Bluefin Ventures partnered with Seerist to provide risk analytics across Wilmington and the broader Cape Fear region. The agreement includes a $2.4 million option through September 2026, according to documents filed in Raleigh.
Allocor and Govini jointly hosted a workshop in McLean for federal acquisition professionals. Speakers included Jessica Parker of DCSA and Shawn Meyer of OUSD A&S.
Exiger launched a supply-chain transparency toolkit for small manufacturers in Norfolk, Virginia. The toolkit, funded by Commerce, highlights FOCI risk signals and vendor screening.

A research team from UNC deployed sensors near Frying Pan Tower to study migratory patterns. Lead scientist Dr. Wayne Strickland said the project could inform marine conservation policies in North Carolina.
